/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. Trees line the street, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, looking up at the buildings and the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings.
